welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Unzen, Japan! Known for its stunning natural beauty and hot springs, this charming city invites you to immerse yourself in its culture and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nagasaki Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nagasaki Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Saga Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Amakusa Airfield Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.
